content.rendered:
Home

Welcome To Our World Of High End Web & Mobile App Design & Development

We are committed to design solutions that create rewarding Results

Request Free Consultation

Our story

It all started in 2015, it has been a long journey since then and today what we are at present as Codevian Technologies Pvt. Ltd. is because of our sharp designers, brilliant engineers/developers and poised business development team. With clients around the globe, we have made a presence in the lives of millions of people by our services delivered.

Mission

At Codevian Technologies, we strive to create solutions that touch people’s life. Being customer centric company, we always focus on invention and development of the industry’s most advanced technologies, that guarantees to Engage Users, Optimize Experience and Drive Conversions. We apply strategic thinking, design insight and practicality to each of our projects to generate more values to our customers!!

Mission

Got an Idea?

Let’s work together and shape it

We are a creative house to help brands grow and tell their story in the most impactful way

We Believe in Innovative

We are Commited to our customers success from start to finish. Our input help makes their solutions stand out from the crowd

We Believe in Functional

The Word is quality we  live by, Be it our work or our communication and our support, quality remains at the top of our priority

We Believe in Link

We are family, with you being a member of it. We believe in making and maintaining long-term relation that for eternity

Vision

To become the most trusted and preferred IT solutions partner for Startups, SMBs and Enterprises through innovation and technology leadership

Vision

Senior & expert Staff
0 %
Delighted Clients
0 +
Retention rate
0 %

Certifications and Recognitions

WHAT OUR CLIENTS SAY ABOUT Codevian

Over 1200+ Satisfied Clients and Growing

Entire web development team attention to every detail of our design, layout, color pallet, branding, and presentation. Their communication and response time was excellent and they welcomed our input. Patiently heard all our concerns or recommendations. We continue to use Codevian for our future projects and we highly recommend them.

Michael (Mike) Lancey

President and CEO Mckenzie Chase Management

Codevian team is amazing. My project was fairly complicated and I never had to micromanage. Yogesh and his team communicated perfectly what I asked of them and provided work that was above what was expected. Worth every penny if you want your project done right the first time.

Carole Bacon

CEO at BullHead City web

Great Company This a great company. The pricing is great and they are smart, reliable and passionate. They offer great solutions to complicated problems. They are always available and very flexible.

Sujith Papali

Director at Hireseat LLP

A very professional and responsive approach to achieve customer goals. Developed Very high Quality BtoC Ecommerce app for our Bhaki Domian

Dilip Joshi

AVP - IT & Engineering at Shemaroo Entertainment Ltd

The new tool helps the internal team save over two hours a day, meeting their expectations. Codevian Technologies Pvt. Ltd. provides a high level of customer service and support. The team is hard-working, creative, and dedicated.

Deepesh G.

CEO at Mpos and Brooms

I have an excellent experience with Codevian's delivery teams. They have good, established processes to deliver a high quality product. More importantly, whenever there's any problem, the team is able to quickly respond and work towards the solution

Vinay Darp

CEO at XtentTeam LLP

Latest Updates from Our Experts

Case Studies

View all case studies

Seventh Generation

June 13, 2024

Indy Build: Case Study of platform for Artists and Fans

April 30, 2024

Shemaroo Bhakti: devotional Mobile App Case Study

April 22, 2024

FAQs

Got a question regarding Angular development? We’re happy to help.

Start today
Do you offer staffing?

Absolutely, we offer staffing solutions through our dedicated team augmentation services. Whether you require continuous help or additional expertise for a particular project, our qualified staff members are here to effortlessly augment your team.

What services do you offer?

We offer a variety of services including: 

  • Mobile app development
  • Software development
  • Front-end development
  • Back-end development
  • UI/UX Designing
  • Startup IT services
  • Web app development
  • Staff Augmentation
  • IT consultation and support
  • And much more.
What makes you unique?

Our persistent dedication to quality and innovation is what separates us from the competition. Every project we take on receives the utmost attention and skill because of our special combination of talent, experience, and customer-centric attitude. Our broad portfolio (which spans several industries) demonstrates our agility and our capacity to create solutions that are specific to the needs of each organisation. We take pleasure in our transparent development approach to efficiently deliver solutions.

 

How experienced is your team?

The team at Codevian has years of experience in many different technological fields. Our developers are proficient in the newest tools and frameworks, and we have successfully completed projects for a variety of industries. All our developers are carefully onboarded after strenuous screening.

 

Do you offer ongoing support and maintenance?

We at Codevian offer comprehensive post-launch support and maintenance services.  

We constantly provide improvements, proactively identify potential problems, and act quickly to address any issue that may occur.

What is your client engagement model?

We provide a range of client engagement models that are customised to meet your unique needs. We have various options to meet your needs, whether they are project-based, part-time, full-time, or hourly. Here are the engagement models that we offer: 

  • Fixed Price Model
  • Time and Materials Model
  • Dedicated Time Model
  • Milestone Billing Model
  • Custom Hybrid Model
Can you show your portfolio?

Certainly! We encourage you to browse our website’s Case Studies section to see our broad range of accomplished projects.

What industries do you serve?

We serve a wide range of industries including

Telecommunications
Non-Profit
Education
Retail
Energy
Government
E-commerce
Real Estate
Entertainment
Finance
Travel and Hospitality
Healthcare
Manufacturing
Automotive
Logistics
And more!
